trans-unit.source: Exposes methods to facilitate UI Automation client access to controls that support synchronized input.
trans-unit.target: Viser metodene for å forenkle Brukergrensesnittet Automation klienttilgang til kontrollene som støtter synkroniserte inndata.

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer dette grensesnittet på en Brukergrensesnittet Automation leverandør må støtte av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern>kontrollen mønsteret.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern>

trans-unit.source: If the provider is currently listening for input, it reverts to normal operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis leverandøren lytter på inndata, går tilbake til vanlig drift.

trans-unit.source: Designates that the provider start listening for input of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Angir som leverandøren starten lytter for å registrere den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: When WPF finds matching input, it checks the route of the incoming event.
trans-unit.target: Når WPF finner samsvarende inndata, kontrollerer ruten for den innkommende hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If the automation element that is listening for the input is not in the route, the input is discarded and the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputDiscardedEvent> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet automation lytter for inndataene ikke er i ruten, forkastes inndataene og <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputDiscardedEvent>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputDiscardedEvent>

trans-unit.source: If the input is received by the automation element listening for that type, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedTargetEvent> event is raised; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedOtherElementEvent> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de er mottatt av elementet automation lytter for denne typen i <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedTargetEvent>hendelsen er hevet; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedOtherElementEvent>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedOtherElementEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPattern.InputReachedTargetEvent>

trans-unit.source: After receiving the input, the provider stops listening and continues normally.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren stopper lytte etter mottak av inndataene, og fortsetter normalt.

trans-unit.source: The type of input to listen for.
